statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_purchases;
SELECT product_name, price FROM virtual_purchases WHERE price > 50;
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM virtual_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_purchases WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, price, purchase_date FROM virtual_purchases WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM virtual_purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM virtual_purchases WHERE purchase_date < '2022-09-01';
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM virtual_purchases GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, price, purchase_date FROM virtual_purchases WHERE product_name LIKE '%computer%' ORDER BY price DESC, purchase_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM virtual_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM virtual_transactions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM virtual_products WHERE product_price >= 50.00 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM virtual_products WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM virtual_products WHERE product_price < 20.00;
SELECT * FROM virtual_transactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM virtual_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT vt.transaction_id, vp.product_name FROM virtual_transactions vt JOIN virtual_products vp ON vt.user_id = 2 AND vp.product_id = 1;
SELECT vt.transaction_amount, vp.product_price FROM virtual_transactions vt, virtual_products vp WHERE vt.user_id = 3 AND vp.product_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM virtual_products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM virtual_products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, user_id FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, t.transaction_id FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM virtual_products;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 'e841dc30-b0cd-4815-9948-60d59b00c520' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, users.username FROM transactions JOIN users ON transactions.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM virtual_products;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM virtual_products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM virtual_products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM virtual_users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT platform_name, launch_date FROM virtual_platforms ORDER BY launch_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM virtual_transactions WHERE user_id = 1234;
SELECT * FROM virtual_products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM virtual_products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM virtual_users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT platform_name, launch_date FROM virtual_platforms WHERE launch_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, category FROM virtual_products WHERE category LIKE '%software%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, product_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN users ON transactions.user_id = users.user_id
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT user_id, username, email, join_date FROM users WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT t.transaction_date, u.username, p.product_name FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id WHERE t.transaction_date >= '2022-06-01'
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM categories JOIN products ON categories.category_id = products.category GROUP BY category_name HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 2
